00118     /*
00119      * When server is started, a custom bluetooth service is advertised
00120      * through QBtServiceAdvertiser. This service can be retrieved using
00121      * getTransmittingServiceInfo(). If needed, the user can set the name
00122      * of the transmitting service when calling this function.
00123      */
00124     void startServer (const QBtUuid & serviceId, const QString& serviceName = "My RFCOMM service");
